column1: Little Goat Diner////Worth making a reservation for lunch but the wait didn't look horrible. Started with the shrimp cocktail which was pretty good. Our entrees were just okay
column2: one had the huge burger with three proteins and onion rings (Goat Almighty) It was just a big burger. I had the Los Drowned and the meat was very tender but was very similar to a normal Italian beef sandwich. Nothing amazing but happy I tried it out.
